content: sammy the stingray - pattern by jocupcake _ 1 - ch6 single_crochet in 2nd st from hook sc3 3sc in next st 3sc along backside of chain 2sc in next st 12 _ 2 - single_crochet around 12 _ 3 - single_crochet increase single_crochet x4 16 _ 4 - ch5 single_crochet in backside of 2nd st from hook sc3 down backside of chain sc8 on body x2 32 _ _ 5-6 - single_crochet around 32 2rnds _ 7 - sc3 decrease sc14 decrease sc11 30 _ 8 - sc2 decrease sc14 decrease sc10 28 place safety eyes between rnds 3 and 4 _ 9 - sc2 decrease sc13 decrease sc9 26 _ 10 - sc2 decrease sc11 decrease sc9 24 _ 11 - single_crochet decrease single_crochet x6 18 stuff the body lightly _ 12 - single_crochet decrease x6 12 _ 13 - decrease x6 6 _ 14 - sc1 fold opening in half work through both layers with 3sc 3 _ _ 15-16 - turn ch1 sc3 3 2rnds _ 17 - turn ch1 sc1 decrease 2 _ _ _ _ 18-21 - turn ch1 sc2 2 4rnds _ 22 - turn ch1 decrease 1 fo weave in ends and you re finished abbreviations us chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet increase - increase decrease - decrease st - stitch round s - round s
